doc:
David Clennon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Clennon 0 David Clennon (born May 10, 1943) is an American actor. He is known for his Emmy-nominated portrayal of Miles Drentell in the ABC series thirtysomething and Once and Again, as well as his role as Palmer in the John Carpenter's cult classic film The Thing. He has been frequently cast in films directed by Hal Ashby and Costa-Gavras. David_Clennon ( born May_10_,_1943 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known for his_Emmy-nominated_portrayal of Miles_Drentell in the_ABC_series_thirtysomething and Once_and_Again , as_well_as his_role as Palmer in the_John_Carpenter 's_cult_classic_film The_Thing . He has_been_frequently_cast in films directed by Hal_Ashby_and_Costa-Gavras .
